attributes.action: Increase the rate of Income Tax by 1p on the understanding that the whole of that money will be paid to the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The NHS has been underfunded for many years. I propose that an increase in Income Tax by 1p, the whole amount of which (nothing taken away in administration)will be paid to the National Health Service. This action will create many millions (billions?) of pounds to be generated for the heath of our country.
